column4: text
Any attacks that inflict damage increase the duration of White Wolf's Wrath by $S$ seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of White Wolf's Wrath by $S$ seconds.
Wolf School Crossbow
Supreme Red Mutagen
Supreme Green Mutagen
Supreme Blue Mutagen
Aerondight, The Sword of Destiny
White Wolf's Wrath

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential. In this state he is invulnerble, his vitality regenerates at an accelerated pace and all of his abilities deal double damage for 20 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds.

Each blow generates charges which increase sword damage by $S$%. Charges are lost over time or when receiving damage. A fully-charged sword always deals critical hit damage and ignores defenses. Is effective against both humans and monsters.
If Toxicity is above 0, each opponent killed increases critical hit chance, damage, attack power and spell power by $I$% for the duration of that fight.
Adrenaline Point loss upon taking damage is lowered by $I$% and stagger duration is divided by $I$. Passive Bonus:Increases attack power by $I$%.
When Adrenaline Points are at their maximum critical hit damage against the targeted enemy type is increased by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases monster damage resistance by $I$%.
When consumed, mutagen decoction increases maximum Vitality by $I$ for decoction's effective duration. Passive Bonus: Increases Slashing, Piercing and Bludgeoning resistance by $I$%.
Extends effective duration of all mutagen decoctions by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases poison damage resistance by $I$%.

Each Adrenaline Point increases the chance of causing a brutal strike by $I$%. Brutal strikes increase overall critical hit damage bonuses by 25%. Passive Bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$% and increases damage resistance by $I$%.
Increases Igni Sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases burning resistance by $I$%.
Increases Yrden Sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases elemental damage resistance by $I$%.
Butcher of Blaviken
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 10.
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 10.
Every known level 1 or 2 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 20.
Every known level 1, 2 or 3 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 30.
Damage from hits received while dodging are reduced by $I$%. Passive bonus:Increases bleeding resistance by $I$%.

Instantly gain one Adrenaline Point when entering combat. The Adrenaline Points generated by sword blows are increased by $I$%. Each adrenaline point now also adds $I$% critical damage bonus. Passive Bonus: All sword attacks deal $I$ bleeding damage.
Violence
Increases attack power by $I$% and critical hit damage by $I$% for all sword attacks. Passive bonus: adds $I$% damage reduction against all attacks.
Increases strong critical hit chance by $I$% and strong attack critical hit damage by $I$%. Strong attacks now crush enemy armor and reduce their damage resistance by $I$%.
Increases the chance to apply Burning by $I$%. Passive Bonus:Adds $I$ fire damage to all attacks (increases with character level).
Increases the damage dealt by Aard to $I$. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$ force damage to all attacks (increases with character level).
Increases potion overdose threshold by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Reduces potiion toxicity by $I$%.
Control Over The Power
Increases damage resistance by $I$% to all attacks. Also increases sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$ shock damage to all attacks.
Increases damage resistance, spell power and provides a passive shock damage bonus to all attacks.

Increases Sign duration by $I$ seconds. Number of alternate mode charges: $I$. Number of Standard mode traps: $I$. Enemies under the influence of Yrden lose $I$ point(s) of Vitality or Essence per second. Receives additional damage from $I$ of spell power.
The 5th Element
Strong attack damage increased by $I$%. Increases bludgeoning damage resistance by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases vitality by $I$%.

Provides $I$% damage reduction against all damage types, increases spell power by $I$% and attack power by $I$%. Passive bonuses: Passive bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$% and reduces enemy resistances by $I$%.
Raw Power
Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks with a chance for knock-down. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Each bolt that hits its target adds $F$ Adrenaline Points. Passive bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$%.
Battle Trance now increases critical hit chance by $I$%, an additional $I$% critical hit damage and $I$% attack power per Adrenaline Point
Target does not move towards Geralt while he is casting Axii. Increases the effectiveness of Axii in dialogues. Reduces Axii casting time. Axii can now be used on two opponents at the same time.
Increases total sign intensity by $I$%, attack power by $I$%. Axii now causes enemies to bleed, dealing $I$ damage per second, scaling with sign intensity.
Increases total sign intensity by $I$%, attack power by $I$%. Axii now causes enemies to bleed, dealing $I$ damage per second, scaling with sign intensity.
Increases total sign intensity by $I$%, attack power by $I$%. Axii now causes enemies to bleed, dealing $I$ damage per second, scaling with sign intensity.
Increases total sign intensity by $I$%, attack power by $I$%. Axii now causes enemies to bleed, dealing $I$ damage per second, scaling with sign intensity.

White Wolf's Boots
Increases maximum Vitality by $I$% when Toxicity exceeds the safe threshold. Passive Bonus: Increases damage reduction by $I$%.
Infatigable Mutagen
Increases attack power by 20%. Actions such as sprinting and jumping do not consume stamina outside of combat.
Gain 50% to Attack and Sign Power, +5/s to Stamina regeneration and +25% to Adrenaline gain while health is at 20% or lower. Resets when health is regained and at the end of combat. 10s cooldown.
On casting a sign in combat, increases stamina regeneration by 1% and sign power by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%. The effect lasts for the duration of the decoction or until meditating.
White Wolf's Wrath
White Wolf's Wrath Is On Cooldown
Solide Mutagen
Increases vitality by 500. Adds 3% damage reduction against all attacks
Hexer Mutagen
Increases Sign Intensity By 20%. Casting the Axiii sign will inflict 400 damage on an enemy and restore a portion of Geralt's life. Damage and life scales with sign intensity.
Time is slowed by an additional $I$% while aiming the crossbow. Passive Bonus:Damage is reduced by $I$%.
When Vitality reaches 0, it will be restored with a bonus of 25%. Requires at least 1 Adrenaline Point, which will be consumed. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points will immediately be consumed to restore it, with a bonus of $I$%. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used. If no Adrenaline Points are available, a small portion of Vitality will be restored. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points will immediately be consumed to restore it, with a bonus of $I$%. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used. If no Adrenaline Points are available, a small portion of Vitality will be restored. If Geralt has White Wolf's Wrath as a skill, it will be activated instead (regardless of whether or not it is on cooldown). Passive Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential. In this state he is invulnerble, his vitality regenerates at an accelerated pace and all of his abilities deal triple damage for 30 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds.

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential. In this state he is invulnerble, his vitality regenerates at an accelerated pace and all of his abilities deal quadruple damage for 40 seconds. This effect will now also be triggered in place of any effects granted by abilities that are used when Geralt's life reaches zero. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds.
